name: test_e2e_with_logs[094_SQLI_UNION_007]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_UNION_007` |
| **Name** | File write via INTO OUTFILE |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | union_based |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' UNION SELECT 1,2,3 INTO OUTFILE '/tmp/test.txt' --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20UNION%20SELECT%201%2C2%2C3%20INTO%20OUTFILE%20%27%2Ftmp%2Ftest.txt%27%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~38000ms
- **Timestamp**: 09:46:02.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Advanced SQL Injection Attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Advanced SQL Injection Attempt test_id=SQLI_UNION_007-1769852762690-5zui2b pattern_id=SQLI_UNION_007 uri=/?q=%27%20UNION%20SELECT%201%2C2%2C3%20INTO%20OUTFILE%20%27%2Ftmp%2Ftest.txt%27%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
